document_data.mainbody:
anana Candy was a well-trained hadrosaurus who competed in the dinosaur races of Port Nyanzaru in Chult during the late 15 century DR.
As of the start of the death curse, Banana Candy was a favorite at the races, with bookies giving it 31 odds of winning. and may have competed in the first leg of that event in which racers drove hadrosaur-pulled chariots.
